title: Always ban your top laners pick
body:
In draft, and ranked make sure to always ban your top laners preferred choice. Because this is the only lane where feeding makes any difference. If your top feeds, you fucking lost. So instead of having them pick something they want. Ban that fuckers preferred champ.

I should probably specify only if it's one of the following is it an acceptable ban {{champion:114}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:150}} Because they won't know what they're doing. i guarantee it.
